description:
Kotone is concerned about the strange atmosphere Fa displays before falling asleep. However, a housing crisis prevents her from looking into the issue further.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Melody for the Grim Reaper!? We`re All Friends! Let`s Get Along!
Shinigami ni Sasageru Melody!? Tomodachi Da mon! Minna Nakayoku Desu!
死神に捧げるメロディ!? 友達だもん! みんな仲良くです!
